content:
（啪叽摔跤声）
Oof- I tripped over some ore...

If you have any questions about daily life,
feel free to ask me anything!
For example, about the lumber around here—

How are you getting along with the mattock?
Just <color=#38b6c5>left-click</color> on your target
to swing it - easy, right?

Swing your mattock,
And whether it's ore or trees,
Good stuff will pop right out!

If you don't have a mattock...
Why not learn from the DIY Card and make one!

Our world bubble is so full of vitality,
even new ores pop up every day!

There's <color=#8AAB4B>broken wood</color>, <color=#8AAB4B>Raw Timber</color>, and <color=#8AAB4B>Weathered Wood</color> along our Astralink...
These are the only types I've observed so far,
If we had a mattock, we could collect them all.

Among all these tools,
The mattock is my favorite!

<color=#8AAB4B>Iron Ore</color>, <color=#8AAB4B>Yingshi</color>, <color=#8AAB4B>Gold Ore</color>...
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
Could you collect them all with your mattock?
